Notes: We’re using low actuation force key switches, but feel free to use another actuation force, in the same 5E series or 5G* You’ll need to modify the panels in consequence if you use a 5G series.
We’re using encoders without detent and without switch, T18. The shortest available in this series. Use PEC11R-4015F-N0024 if you want D_Shaft terminaison.
Cut two pins from a male 2.54 breakable pin strip like the reference suggested. (Order only one if you order the Adafruit 392, it’s a pack of 10 pieces)
Adjust height depending on the thickness of the panel etc. Try multiple heights eventually. These caps fit the 5E series ONLY.
Use what you want, adjust the choice of encoders in consequence (T18 or D-Shaft)

Designator: It is strongly suggested to read the notes before ordering this bill of material
The asterisk means that the corresponding line is probably optional. Read the corresponding section in « notes.md »
